title: very bad ping spikes (packet loss)
body:
i am having a bad case of packet loss, what i don't know... is how to fix it.

i don't have access to anything other than my own computer (i cant change router setting or talk to the isp)

my questions is is there anything i can do with my my computer alone to try to minimize this issue, at least enough to allow me to play ranked..

i normally get a 2-5 second lag spike between 200-800 MS on random intervals
 i have determined the issue is packet loss

http://imgur.com/a/sYACt

replies.body: i have my computer firewall setting (norton antivirus) to pass all league ports through.. and i made an exception for league

Hmmmm that packet loss is probably the source of all your problems for sure. Essentially, this is happening because your connection is losing bits of the data it's sending here and there, which can be pretty hard to fix since it might be happening from how your ISP is routing your connection. We could try using a VPN to route yourself a different way, but go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need some better one on one help with this!
is there anything i can do to try to fix this?
